overview: Featuring an emerging scientist from the Lower Elwha Klallam Tribe, Renewal is a heart-warming story of transformation and restoration. Supported by HHMI and Tangled Bank Studios, this short film is part of HHMI's "Think Like A Scientist" series. It is also a follow-up to a feature film by the same Producer, chronicling the largest dam removal in history. This film was published in Nautilus Magazine with an essay by featured scientist Cameron Macias.
title: Think Like A Scientist: Renewal
